Package assignment

Class PixelOperations

java.lang.Object
assignment.PixelOperator
class PixelOperations extends Object
Contains operations to apply to 2D pixel arrays.

  • Method Details

    • RGBScaleShift

      public static int[][] RGBScaleShift(int[][] pixels, double[][] scale, int[] preShift, int[] postShift, PixelRange range)
      Applies a linear or affine transformation to the RGB Values to all pixels in a specified range.
      Parameters:
      pixels - 2D array describing each pixel's RGB values through an int
      scale - 3X3 matrix to project onto RGB values
      preShift - 3X1 vector to offset RGB values to each pixel BEFORE scaling
      postShift - 3X1 vector to offset RGB values to each pixel AFTER scaling
      range - Range of Pixels Affected
      Returns:
      2D array of pixels scaled and shifted as described

    • RGBScaleShift

      Parameters:
      pixels - 2D array describing each pixel's RGB values through an int
      scale - 3X3 matrix to project onto RGB values
      shift - 3X1 vector to offset RGB values to each pixel AFTER scaling
      range - Range of Pixels Affected
      Returns:
      2D array of pixels scaled and shifted as described

      Returns:

      public static int[] BrightnessMedian(int[][] pixels, PixelRange range)

      Parameters:
      pixels - 2D array describing each pixel's RGB values through an int
      range - Range of Pixels Affected
      Returns:
      An int array with the RGB values of the median pixel with respect to brightness

    • pixelContrast

      public static double pixelContrast(int[][] pixels, PixelRange range, double DEGREE)
      Finds the norm contrast in a specified range.
      Parameters:
      pixels - 2D array describing each pixel's RGB values through an int
      range - Range of Pixels Affected
      DEGREE - Degree of Deviation
      Returns:
      The length of the contrast vector, calculated by taking DEGREE-norm differences
